name: Operation "Meat Grinder"
description:
Heroes are dumb, Heroes are easy to fool, Heroes make good meat for the dungeon Grinder! The heroes are just peasants with dreams of treasure, lead them to your dungeon before they gain skills and levels. They will be easy to slay. 

However be careful as when they enter certain buildings they will learn skills and gain levels. The idea is to lead them to your dungeon as soon as possible...but where was that dungeon entrance!

Kill those terrible Heroes - before they are no-longer so Terrible!

Remember, you first need to find the dungeon entrance (Tomb). 

Once found lead the heroes there (a few well placed tiles will help prompt their directions) but make sure you miss the buildings that will improve their stats!

Assets used:-

  • Synty Polygon Mini Fantasy Pack (Unity)
  • Free Fantasy Adventure Music Pack (Unity)
  • Some effects from FreeSound.Org

Please Note, there is a WebGL and Windows version of this game. I hope you enjoy it.
